description.value:
You have in your veins the ever-changing wildness of primal chaos, the raw essence of unbound creation. Your mind and spirit burst with the constant inspiration of consummate freedom, though you have difficulty following through on a task when another, new and exciting, catches your interest.

Class Skill: Knowledge (planes).

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ja005kj1gh7g0dnk]{Entropic Shield} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.18kryvj2dfuymk9d]{Blur} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mqdoexj35atgqafn]{Gaseous Form} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{Confusion} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.b8lt1275mz4ez4d8]{Major Creation} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.sxyiwj0z95piv96i]{Disintegrate} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.t44p3oeq43jwcgwg]{Polymorph, Greater} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2sa3881har33geo1]{Polymorph Any Object} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{Shapechange} (19th).

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.lxDJhpqwtR3J4UXx]{Agile Maneuvers},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.F9mKy0SmRo4bTdni]{Defensive Combat Training},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.9mcYid7xJY9NiySx]{Enlarge Spell},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{Great Fortitude},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.1hxjrJ68yWsiCCFD]{Improved Great Fortitude},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{Skill Focus} (Craft [any]),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.V2zY7BltkpSXwejy]{Spell Focus},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{Toughness}.

Bloodline Arcana: Your magic of creation and changing is hard to unravel. The DC to dispel transmutation or conjuration (creation) spells that you cast is increased by +4.
